verses.verse: דִּבְרֵ֤י ׀ <WH1697> The words אָג֥וּר <WH94> of Agur בִּן־ <WH1121> the son יָקֶ֗ה <WH3348> of Jakeh הַמַּ֫שָּׂ֥א <WH4853> [even] the prophecy נְאֻ֣ם <WH5002> spake הַ֭גֶּבֶר <WH1397> the man לְאִֽיתִיאֵ֑ל <WH384> unto Ithiel לְאִ֖יתִיאֵ֣ל <WH384> even unto Ithiel וְאֻכָֽל׃ <WH401> and Ucal

כִּ֤י <WH3588> Surely בַ֣עַר <WH1198> Surely I [am] more brutish אָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> I מֵאִ֑ישׁ <WH376> than [any] man וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not בִינַ֖ת <WH998> and have not the understanding אָדָ֣ם <WH120> of a man לִֽי׃
וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> Neither לָמַ֥דְתִּי <WH3925> I neither learned חָכְמָ֑ה <WH2451> wisdom וְדַ֖עַת <WH1847> the knowledge קְדֹשִׁ֣ים <WH6918> of the holy אֵדָֽע׃ <WH3045> nor have

מִ֤י <WH4310> Who עָלָֽה־ <WH5927> Who hath ascended up שָׁמַ֨יִם ׀ <WH8064> into heaven וַיֵּרַ֡ד <WH3381> or descended מִ֤י <WH4310> Who אָֽסַף־ <WH622> ? who hath gathered ר֨וּחַ ׀ <WH7307> the wind בְּחָפְנָ֡יו <WH2651> fists מִ֤י <WH4310> Who צָֽרַר־ <WH6887> has wrapped מַ֨יִם ׀ <WH4325> the waters בַּשִּׂמְלָ֗ה <WH8071> apparel מִ֭י <WH4310> Who הֵקִ֣ים <WH6965> has established כָּל־ <WH3605> all אַפְסֵי־ <WH657> all the ends אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> common מַה־ <WH4100> how long שְּׁמ֥וֹ <WH8034> name וּמַֽה־ <WH4100> how long שֶּׁם־ <WH8034> is his name בְּ֝נ֗וֹ <WH1121> and what [is] his son's כִּ֣י <WH3588> for תֵדָֽע׃ <WH3045> if thou canst tell

כָּל־ <WH3605> Every אִמְרַ֣ת <WH565> Every word אֱל֣וֹהַּ <WH433> of God צְרוּפָ֑ה <WH6884> [is] pure מָגֵ֥ן <WH4043> he [is] a shield ה֝֗וּא <WH1931> who לַֽחֹסִ֥ים <WH2620> unto them that put their trust בּֽוֹ׃

אַל־ <WH408> not תּ֥וֹסְףְּ <WH3254> Add עַל־ <WH5921> unto דְּבָרָ֑יו <WH1697> thou not unto his words פֶּן־ <WH6435> Or יוֹכִ֖יחַ <WH3198> lest he reprove בְּךָ֣ וְנִכְזָֽבְתָּ׃ <WH3576> thee and thou be found a liar פ

שְׁ֭תַּיִם <WH8147> Two שָׁאַ֣לְתִּי <WH7592> [things] have I required מֵאִתָּ֑ךְ <WH853> אַל־ <WH408> not תִּמְנַ֥ע <WH4513> of thee deny מִ֝מֶּ֗נִּי <WH4480> at בְּטֶ֣רֶם <WH2962> before אָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> me [them] not before I die

שָׁ֤וְא ׀ <WH7723> from me vanity וּֽדְבַר־ <WH1697> act כָּזָ֡ב <WH3577> and lies הַרְחֵ֬ק <WH7368> Remove far מִמֶּ֗נִּי <WH4480> at רֵ֣אשׁ <WH7389> me neither poverty וָ֭עֹשֶׁר <WH6239> nor riches אַל־ <WH408> neither תִּֽתֶּן־ <WH5414> give לִ֑י הַ֝טְרִיפֵ֗נִי <WH2963> feed לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> me with food חֻקִּֽי׃ <WH2706> convenient

פֶּ֥ן <WH6435> I אֶשְׂבַּ֨ע ׀ <WH7646> Lest I be full וְכִחַשְׁתִּי֮ <WH3584> and deny וְאָמַ֗רְתִּי <WH559> [thee] and say מִ֥י <WH4310> Who יְה֫וָ֥ה <WH3069> God וּפֶֽן־ <WH6435> lest אִוָּרֵ֥שׁ <WH3423> cast out וְגָנַ֑בְתִּי <WH1589> and steal וְ֝תָפַ֗שְׂתִּי <WH8610> and take שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> the name אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> of my God פ

אַל־ <WH408> not תַּלְשֵׁ֣ן <WH3960> Accuse עֶ֭בֶד <WH5650> not a servant אֶל־ <WH413> about [אֲדֹנֹו כ] (אֲדֹנָ֑יו <WH113> your lord ק) פֶּֽן־ <WH6435> Or יְקַלֶּלְךָ֥ <WH7043> lest he curse וְאָשָֽׁמְתָּ׃ <WH816> thee and thou be found guilty

דּ֭וֹר <WH1755> [There is] a generation אָבִ֣יו <WH1> their father יְקַלֵּ֑ל <WH7043> [that] curseth וְאֶת־ <WH853> אִ֝מּ֗וֹ <WH517> their mother לֹ֣א <WH3808> and does not יְבָרֵֽךְ׃ <WH1288> and doth not bless

דּ֭וֹר <WH1755> [There is] a generation טָה֣וֹר <WH2889> [that are] pure בְּעֵינָ֑יו <WH5869> in their own eyes וּ֝מִצֹּאָת֗וֹ <WH6675> from their filthiness לֹ֣א <WH3808> not רֻחָֽץ׃ <WH7364> and [yet] is not washed

דּ֭וֹר <WH1755> [There is] a generation מָה־ <WH4100> how long רָמ֣וּ <WH7311> O how lofty עֵינָ֑יו <WH5869> are their eyes וְ֝עַפְעַפָּ֗יו <WH6079> and their eyelids יִנָּשֵֽׂאוּ׃ <WH5375> are lifted up

דּ֤וֹר ׀ <WH1755> [There is] a generation חֲרָב֣וֹת <WH2719> [are as] swords שִׁנָּיו֮ <WH8127> whose teeth וּֽמַאֲכָל֪וֹת <WH3979> [as] knives מְֽתַלְּעֹ֫תָ֥יו <WH4973> and their jaw teeth לֶאֱכֹ֣ל <WH398> to devour עֲנִיִּ֣ים <WH6041> the poor מֵאֶ֑רֶץ <WH776> from off the earth וְ֝אֶבְיוֹנִ֗ים <WH34> and the needy מֵאָדָֽם׃ <WH120> from [among] men פ

לַֽעֲלוּקָ֨ה ׀ <WH5936> The horseleach שְׁתֵּ֥י <WH8147> hath two בָנוֹת֮ <WH1323> daughters הַ֤ב ׀ <WH3051> [crying] Give הַ֥ב <WH3051> give שָׁל֣וֹשׁ <WH7969> There are three הֵ֭נָּה <WH2007> in לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תִשְׂבַּ֑עְנָה <WH7646> [things that] are never satisfied אַ֝רְבַּ֗ע <WH702> [yea] four לֹא־ <WH3808> not אָ֥מְרוּ <WH559> [things] say הֽוֹן׃ <WH1952> not [It is] enough

שְׁאוֹל֮ <WH7585> The grave וְעֹ֪צֶ֫ר <WH6115> and the barren רָ֥חַם <WH7356> womb אֶ֭רֶץ <WH776> the earth לֹא־ <WH3808> is never שָׂ֣בְעָה <WH7646> [that] is not filled מַּ֑יִם <WH4325> with water וְ֝אֵ֗שׁ <WH784> and the fire לֹא־ <WH3808> never אָ֥מְרָה <WH559> [that] saith הֽוֹן׃ <WH1952> not [It is] enough

עַ֤יִן ׀ <WH5869> The eye תִּֽלְעַ֣ג <WH3932> [that] mocketh לְאָב֮ <WH1> at [his] father וְתָב֪וּז <WH936> and despiseth לִֽיקֲּהַ֫ת־ <WH3349> to obey אֵ֥ם <WH517> [his] mother יִקְּר֥וּהָ <WH5365> shall pick it out עֹרְבֵי־ <WH6158> the ravens נַ֑חַל <WH5158> of the valley וְֽיֹאכְל֥וּהָ <WH398> shall eat בְנֵי־ <WH1121> and the young נָֽשֶׁר׃ <WH5404> eagles פ

שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> There be three הֵ֭מָּה <WH1992> There נִפְלְא֣וּ <WH6381> [things which] are too wonderful מִמֶּ֑נִּי <WH4480> are too [וְאַרְבָּע כ] (וְ֝אַרְבָּעָ֗ה <WH702> four ק) לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יְדַעְתִּֽים׃ <WH3045> which I know

דֶּ֤רֶךְ <WH1870> The way הַנֶּ֨שֶׁר ׀ <WH5404> of an eagle בַּשָּׁמַיִם֮ <WH8064> in the air דֶּ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> the way נָחָ֗שׁ <WH5175> of a serpent עֲלֵ֫י <WH5921> on צ֥וּר <WH6697> upon a rock דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <WH1870> the way אֳנִיָּ֥ה <WH591> of a ship בְלֶב־ <WH3820> in the midst יָ֑ם <WH3220> of the sea וְדֶ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> and the way גֶּ֣בֶר <WH1397> of a man בְּעַלְמָֽה׃ <WH5959> with a maid

כֵּ֤ן ׀ <WH3651> This דֶּ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> Such [is] the way אִשָּׁ֗ה <WH802> woman מְנָ֫אָ֥פֶת <WH5003> of an adulterous אָ֭כְלָה <WH398> she eateth וּמָ֣חֲתָה <WH4229> and wipeth פִ֑יהָ <WH6310> her mouth וְ֝אָמְרָ֗ה <WH559> and saith לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no פָעַ֥לְתִּי <WH6466> I have done אָֽוֶן׃ <WH205> no wickedness פ

תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Under שָׁ֭לוֹשׁ <WH7969> For three רָ֣גְזָה <WH7264> is disquieted אֶ֑רֶץ <WH776> [things] the earth וְתַ֥חַת <WH8478> and under אַ֝רְבַּ֗ע <WH702> and for four לֹא־ <WH3808> it תוּכַ֥ל <WH3201> [which] it cannot שְׂאֵֽת׃ <WH5375> bear

תַּֽחַת־ <WH8478> Under עֶ֭בֶד <WH5650> For a servant כִּ֣י <WH3588> when יִמְל֑וֹךְ <WH4427> when he reigneth וְ֝נָבָ֗ל <WH5036> and a fool כִּ֣י <WH3588> when יִֽשְׂבַּֽע־ <WH7646> when he is filled לָֽחֶם׃ <WH3899> with meat

תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Under שְׂ֭נוּאָה <WH8130> For an odious כִּ֣י <WH3588> when תִבָּעֵ֑ל <WH1166> [woman] when she is married וְ֝שִׁפְחָ֗ה <WH8198> and an handmaid כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when תִירַ֥שׁ <WH3423> that is heir גְּבִרְתָּֽהּ׃ <WH1404> to her mistress פ

אַרְבָּ֣עָה <WH702> There be four הֵ֭ם <WH1992> like קְטַנֵּי־ <WH6996> [things which are] little אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> upon the earth וְ֝הֵ֗מָּה <WH1992> like חֲכָמִ֥ים <WH2450> wise מְחֻכָּמִֽים׃ <WH2449> but they [are] exceeding

הַ֭נְּמָלִים <WH5244> The ants עַ֣ם <WH5971> [are] a people לֹא־ <WH3808> are not עָ֑ז <WH5794> not strong וַיָּכִ֖ינוּ <WH3559> yet they prepare בַקַּ֣יִץ <WH7019> in the summer לַחְמָֽם׃ <WH3899> their meat

שְׁ֭פַנִּים <WH8227> The conies עַ֣ם <WH5971> folk לֹא־ <WH3808> are not עָצ֑וּם <WH6099> [are but] a feeble וַיָּשִׂ֖ימוּ <WH7760> yet make בַסֶּ֣לַע <WH5553> in the rocks בֵּיתָֽם׃ <WH1004> they their houses
מֶ֭לֶךְ <WH4428> have no king אֵ֣ין <WH369> have לָאַרְבֶּ֑ה <WH697> The locusts וַיֵּצֵ֖א <WH3318> yet go they forth חֹצֵ֣ץ <WH2686> all of them by bands כֻּלּֽוֹ׃ <WH3605> all
שְׂ֭מָמִית <WH8079> The spider בְּיָדַ֣יִם <WH3027> with her hands תְּתַפֵּ֑שׂ <WH8610> taketh hold וְ֝הִ֗יא <WH1931> he בְּהֵ֣יכְלֵי <WH1964> palaces מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> and is in kings' פ

שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> There be three הֵ֭מָּה <WH1992> There מֵיטִ֣יבֵי <WH3190> well צָ֑עַד <WH6806> [things] which go וְ֝אַרְבָּעָ֗ה <WH702> yea four מֵיטִ֥בֵי <WH3190> are stately לָֽכֶת׃ <WH1980> walk

לַ֭יִשׁ <WH3918> A lion גִּבּ֣וֹר <WH1368> [which is] strongest בַּבְּהֵמָ֑ה <WH929> among beasts וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and does not יָ֝שׁ֗וּב <WH7725> and turneth not away מִפְּנֵי־ <WH6440> for כֹֽל׃ <WH3605> any

זַרְזִ֣יר <WH2223> greyhound מָתְנַ֣יִם <WH4975> rooster אוֹ־ <WH176> also תָ֑יִשׁ <WH8495> an he goat וּ֝מֶ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> and a king אַלְק֥וּם <WH510> against whom [there is] no rising up עִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> with

אִם־ <WH518> If נָבַ֥לְתָּ <WH5034> If thou hast done foolishly בְהִתְנַשֵּׂ֑א <WH5375> in lifting up וְאִם־ <WH518> if זַ֝מּ֗וֹתָ <WH2161> thyself or if thou hast thought evil יָ֣ד <WH3027> [lay] thine hand לְפֶֽה׃ <WH6310> upon thy mouth

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For מִ֪יץ <WH4330> Surely the churning חָלָ֡ב <WH2461> of milk י֘וֹצִ֤יא <WH3318> bringeth forth חֶמְאָ֗ה <WH2529> butter וּֽמִיץ־ <WH4330> and the wringing אַ֭ף <WH639> of the nose י֣וֹצִיא <WH3318> bringeth forth דָ֑ם <WH1818> blood וּמִ֥יץ <WH4330> so the forcing אַ֝פַּ֗יִם <WH639> of wrath י֣וֹצִיא <WH3318> bringeth forth רִֽיב׃ <WH7379> strife פ
